ginplugin.name: CSV Content Provider
ginplugin.description: This ContentProvider plugin is able to connect to a file repository with CMIS support and provided files as Content objects to the iQser GIN Server.

params.param: Delimeter of the CSV file; default is ';'
Charset of the CSV file; default is 'UTF-8'
Comma seperated list of zero based numbers of the ID-columns; default is '0'

If true and if there is only a single ID column, the ID column will be used as ContentUrl; default is 'false' Example of an generated ContentUrl: iqser://iqsercsvplugin.sf.net/[TYPE]/[ID-COLUMN-VALUE-1]/[ID-COLUMN-VALUE-2]/[...]
Comma seperated list of zero-based column numbers that will become key attributes; default is null (empty)
Comma seperated list of zero-based column numbers that will be ignored; default is null (empty)
